backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-agent debate system with user profiles, file registry, agent management (9 pre-populated agents with types), debate state tracking, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files documenting React components, hooks, utilities, and configuration for a multi-agent debate system with speech recognition, file upload, and agent management features.
frontend/.env: Local development environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'local'.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'ic' for mainnet deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette defining neutral grayscale design tokens for light and dark modes with sidebar, chart, and destructive color variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the React application titled 'The Gang'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health), authentication via Internet Identity, debate controls including push-to-talk and text command input, and transcript download functionality.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying system infrastructure vitals with toggle switches for enabling/disabling agents, memory usage progress bars, diagnostics modal, and a reset agents button.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Modal dialog displaying agent diagnostics with terminal-style UI showing agent ID, status, and telemetry information in a monospace green-on-black theme.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays the debate transcript in a scrollable card with speaker badges (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM), text-to-speech controls for each message, and an emergency mode indicator. Auto-scrolls to the latest message when the transcript updates.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an active debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation. Shows loading state while the abort request is pending.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition that starts/stops listening on click and calls onTranscriptComplete callback when speech recognition stops with new transcript. Includes error handling and browser support detection.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) by chunking large files and routing them to appropriate agents via the backend. Shows upload progress, supports text and image file types, and requires authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state and auth client lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and delegation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including debate status polling, starting/aborting debates, document routing, agent status management, and boardroom clearing with automatic cache invalidation.
React hook that wraps the Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice input functionality with start/stop controls, transcript state, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the Web Speech Synthesis API to provide text-to-speech functionality with voice selection (preferring British male voices) and speaking state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future integration of Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, plus base typography and code font styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration with React plugin, environment variable injection for canister IDs, path aliases, and local development proxy for API calls.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the single-user Internet Identity-secured architecture, removal of all backend permission checks, locked Golden Master backend (v56), multi-canister telemetry setup, and existing features list.
